entities.name: borgin
entities.description: Borgin and Burke were experts at Dark objects, they would’ve recognized a Horcrux straightaway.

entities.name: burke
entities.description: Borgin and Burke were experts at Dark objects, they would’ve recognized a Horcrux straightaway.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry repeated the argument he kept bringing out in favor of this theory.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore said in front of me that he never assumed he knew all of Hogwarts’s secrets.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Harry plowed on, “I still reckon he might have hidden something at Hogwarts.”

entities.name: volde... you know who
entities.description: If there was one place that was really important to You-Know-Who, it was Hogwarts!

relationships.description: Borgin and Burke were experts at Dark objects, they would’ve recognized a Horcrux straightaway.
Harry plowed on, “I still reckon he might have hidden something at Hogwarts.”
Dumbledore said in front of me that he never assumed he knew all of Hogwarts’s secrets.
If there was one place that was really important to You-Know-Who, it was Hogwarts!
